markdownRemark.html:
I’ve had some opportunities to write blogs and documents throgout my career but I always deferred the moment to atually write my own stuff.

Now, I’m finally ready – I guess. The idea is document and share my learnings so that you – dear reader – and myself can come back later and check things out. I hope you enjoy the blog and I’d love to get some feedback. To do so, feel free to contact me via email: alabeduarte@gmail.com.
